body: Hello guys,how are you? i am looking for a good program to record videogames (not only minecraft) if you know tell me in the commentary boox,Thanks and cya!

title: Looking for a recorder program

replies.body:
OBS is free and is easy to use.
You can download it here.
And you can follow this guide if you want to learn how to use easily record.
